attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WOULD LIKE TO STOP FREE TRAVEL ON THE UNDERGROUND AFTER 6PM  (EXCEPT FOR OAP'S) IN THE EVENINGS 
THIS WOULD STOP KIDS FROM GOING INTO AREAS WHERE THEY DONT LIVE- PUTTING GRAFFITI EVERYWHERE AND DISTORYING TAX PAYERS PROPERTY - ALSO WE WOULD NOT HAVE TO PUT UP WITH THE THREATENING BEHAVIOUR.

rejection.details: The 'title' must be a call to action for HM Government not just a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
